name: Decorative Gourd Season
description:
Decorative Gourd Season is an endless runner that was created using the LÖVE2D framework.  It's my first game and I had a lot of fun building it.  I hope you enjoy and thank you for playing!

All of the Halloween decorations have come to life and have taken over the city!  You play Brandy, an avid autumn decor enthusiast, who is running through the city dodging decorations as she goes.  How far can you get before they get you?

Asset Credits:

  • Backgrounds and coffee texture - ansimuz
  • Character texture - RaulDiaz
  • Halloween character textures - ismartal
  • Fonts - Phelan Riessen and Vasily Draigo
  • Music - Bit by Bit Bert
